info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 20 at 11:58AM EDT until June 22 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis IN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois...
White River at Elliston...and Edwardsport.
Wabash River at Hutsonville Legacy Power Plant Site...and Riverton.
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Indiana...
Wabash River at Montezuma.
.Additional rainfall earlier this week brought new rises to area waterways... with the Wabash River now falling in flood at Montezuma... Hutsonville...and Riverton...while the White River is flooding near crest at both Elliston...and Edwardsport. The White River is expected to reach bankfull at both Petersburg and Hazleton early next week.
Dry and hot weather with considerable sunshine is expected into next week, which will promote moving excess water out of the drainage system and drying the soil.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...White River at Elliston.
* WHEN...Until Sunday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, River Road north of CR 150 W in Greene County is flooded. Low agricultural fields flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning and continue falling and remain below flood stage. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind.
The next statement should be issued late tonight by around 300 AM EDT /200 AM CDT/.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING

area.areaDesc: Daviess, IN; Greene, IN; Knox, IN
